about_the_game:
Skellington is a cute 3D platformer starring a goofy skeleton who just wants to go back to sleep!
Unfortunately, a child has been robbed of their halloween candy by ghosts and is crying uncontrollably in the graveyard... Our friendly skeleton hero will go on a quest to collect all of the candy, return it to the child and finally get his well-deserved rest!

The candy has been scattered around 8 different worlds, accessed by the gravestones of the ghosts.
Run through these worlds and use your platforming skills to find all hidden candies!

The pumpkins can be a tricky bunch, some are very nice, and contain lots of candy!
Others, eh... Not so much.
Learn about all of the pumpkin types and use their abilities to your advantage!

Moving platforms are often scattered around in these worlds!
Master your platforming abilities and make your way through these obstacle course-like levels!

name: Skellington

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: GTX 550
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A 3D-Platformer collectathon! Run, jump, crawl, bounce and stomp your way through halloween themed levels!
